title: Heart of Iron is bugged

embed.description: Appears Tenacity is slightly broken. Have not tested on other champions. Not frame values could be slightly off due to recording but leagues internal clock runs at 30hz so should not be too far off.

body:
I tested tenacity vs lulu polymorph. It appears as if heart of iron is only applying 8 percent. 

Also glitterdance is not affected by tenacity at all?

replies.body:
Its working perfectly fine stat wise, its probably just lulu being bugged again.

And what the hell is heart of iron. Its pronounced "Elixir of iron".
nah its just lulu, sometimes her polymorph goes through yasuo's wall or qss cant remove her q slow or polymorph, she has been that way since 6.7

yeah except I've noticed that elixir of iron sometimes interacts weirdly with certain sources of cc such as shaco box fear (with a bit of trial and error I'm certain I can replicate this, tenacity seems to only help against this fear sometimes), and casseopia sludge.

Her sludge isnt affected by tenacity... its on off as as soon as off it drops. And shaco box fear isnt reliable even without tenacity, sometimes it fears, sometimes it doesn't sometimes it only does 1/2 duration.
